title: Am I the only one who feels like BTS is growing apart? - Quora

response.answer_text: No your not but there always together so I'm sure they probably get on each others nervous but I hope whatever is going on they don't break up plus jin and suga are going to military soon mabey that's why they don't seem as close plus I kinda think jhope wants to go out on his own but I think he is scared like he doesn't want to hurt the guys he has been there from the start and when you have been with the same guys from the age of 18 he would find hard
